strings:
<voice_0x010017D2><se_low><center>GRRRRAAAGH!
<center>Why do humans dare to appear before me?

<voice_0x010017D3><se_low><center>Perhaps to offer themselves as sacrifices!
<center>Very well. Your wish is granted!
<voice_0x010017D4><se_low><center>GRRRRAAAGH!
<voice_0x010017D5><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: ...What have I done? After the ritual, everything felt wrong... As though I were entangled in the threads of some enduring nightmare.
<voice_0x010017D6><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Humans? What are humans doing here?

<voice_0x010017D7><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: ...No, I remember now.
You confronted me when I was out of control.
<voice_0x010017D8><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Brave humans, you have my gratitude. Had you not put an end to my madness, it would have meant the end of the Dragovian race.

<voice_0x010017D9><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I decided to abandon my human form,
yet it was humans who rescued me.
It appears my decision was a grave mistake.

<voice_0x010017DA><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: You! <Cap><hero>!
How can this be?

<voice_0x010017DB><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: You saved me, <hero>...
No, you saved all of the Dragovians.
What a strange hand fate has dealt us.

<voice_0x010017DC><se_low>Yangus: How come 'e knows who you are, guv?
And wot's all this about fate?
<voice_0x010017DF><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Ah. It seems you remain unaware of your true origins, <hero>. Or per[-]haps your memories have yet to be reawakened.

<voice_0x010017E0><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Very well, <hero>. You are the child of a human father and a Dragovian mother.
The blood of both races runs through
your veins.
<voice_0x010017E1><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: But of that I will speak no further. Consult your grandfather if you wish to know more.

<voice_0x010017E2><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Chen Mui. I sense your presence.
Reveal yourself.

<voice_0x010017E3><se_low>Chen Mui: I should have known your penetrating gaze would see through my disguise, my Lord.
Forgive me.
<voice_0x010017E4><se_low>Chen Mui: I apologise for hiding my identity from you for so long, <hero>.
<voice_0x010017E5><se_low>Chen Mui: I am your grandfather. I disguised myself as Munchie so that I could travel alongside you and see that you were all right.

<voice_0x010017E6><se_low>Chen Mui: I understand you must be shocked.
Anyone would be.
<voice_0x010017E7><se_low>Chen Mui: And now I will fulfil my promise to unravel the mystery of your birth for you.

<voice_0x010017E8><se_low>Chen Mui: It is quite a long tale, however.
May I suggest we adjourn to my home,
where we can speak at our leisure?

<voice_0x010017E9><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Very well.
I shall transport you back to the Sanctuary.

<voice_0x010017EA><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Please visit me again once Chen Mui has satisfied your curiosity, <hero>.
There is still much for us to discuss as well.
<voice_0x010017EB><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: You have earnt the right to undertake the Dragovian Trials.

<voice_0x010017EC><se_low>Chen Mui: Ah. Home again, home again.
The power of the Lord of the Dragovians is a wondrous thing.
<voice_0x010017ED><se_low>Chen Mui: Well, then. There is something I would like to give you, <hero>. Follow me.
<voice_0x010017EE><se_low>Chen Mui: <Cap><hero>... This is a keepsake of your mother, Xia. It was given to her as a present by your father.

<voice_0x010017EF><se_low>Chen Mui: Does the jewel set in the ring seem familiar
at all?

<voice_0x010017F0><se_low>Chen Mui: I thought it might. It's an Argon heart.
Obtained by your father twenty years ago
during his initiation...as Prince of Argonia.
<voice_0x010017F1><se_low>Chen Mui: Long ago, some twenty years previous, a curious Dragovian girl by the name of Xia decided to visit the world of the humans.
<voice_0x010017F2><se_low>Chen Mui: There she chanced to meet a young prince named Eltrio.
<voice_0x010017F3><se_low>Chen Mui: It was love at first sight!
<voice_0x010017F4><se_low>Chen Mui: But her father Chen Mui, none other than yours truly, objected.

<voice_0x010017F5><se_low>Chen Mui: He took Xia back home to the Dragovian Sanctuary so that the couple could never
meet again.
<voice_0x010017F6><se_low>Chen Mui: He thought it was the right thing to do.
<voice_0x010017F7><se_low>Chen Mui: He believed there would never be any way for a Dragovian and a human to build a happy life together. But he was wrong.
<voice_0x010017F8><se_low>Chen Mui: His foolish decision caused no end of sadness and tragedy for his beloved daughter Xia.
<voice_0x010017F9><se_low>Chen Mui: Shortly after Chen Mui forced his daughter back to the Sanctuary, a human body was found just outside.
<voice_0x010017FA><se_low>Chen Mui: It was Eltrio. He had fought desperately to find Xia again, but died just before reaching the gates of the Sanctuary.

<voice_0x010017FB><se_low>Chen Mui: The death of her true love wounded Xia
to her very soul.
She plunged into an inconsolable sorrow.
Her life ebbed away from her day by day.

<voice_0x010017FC><se_low>Chen Mui: One day, even while absorbed in her grief,
Xia realised that she was pregnant with
Eltrio's child.

<voice_0x010017FD><se_low>Chen Mui: Every single one of the Dragovians objected,
but she stood firm and decided to keep the baby.
<voice_0x010017FE><se_low>Chen Mui: Xia delivered a healthy baby boy, but in her weakened state, she never recovered from the strain of childbirth and passed away soon after.
<voice_0x010017FF><se_low>Chen Mui: The Council of Elders convened a discussion to decide what should be done about <hero>, the half-human, half-Dragovian child.
<voice_0x01001800><se_low>Chen Mui: It took several years, but finally the Council of Elders announced their final decision.

<voice_0x01001801><se_low>Chen Mui: The child's memory would be sealed away,
and he would be banished from the
Sanctuary forever.
<voice_0x01001802><se_low>Chen Mui: Needless to say, by this time Chen Mui had changed his mind. He argued against the cruel and closed-minded decision at great length.
<voice_0x01001803><se_low>Chen Mui: But the Council of Elders refused to reverse it.
<voice_0x01001804><se_low>Chen Mui: Chen Mui cursed himself for his powerlessness.
<voice_0x01001805><se_low>Chen Mui: Shortly thereafter, the Lord of the Dragovians used his power to seal away the child's memories and the boy was expelled from the Sanctuary.

<voice_0x01001806><se_low>Chen Mui: The boy was Chen Mui's last remaining
connection to his only daughter. He knew
he could never truly abandon the child.
<voice_0x01001807><se_low>Chen Mui: So Chen Mui begged the Lord of the Dragovians for permission to follow his grandson into the human world.
<voice_0x01001808><se_low>Chen Mui: The Lord of the Dragovians told Chen Mui that he would only allow it if Chen Mui disguised his true appearance as a mouse...
<voice_0x01001809><se_low>Chen Mui: ...and never spoke directly to <hero>.
<voice_0x0100180A><se_low>Chen Mui: Considering the hardship his grandson would be facing as an exile and an orphan in a totally new and unknown world...
<voice_0x0100180B><se_low>Chen Mui: ...Chen Mui made up his mind at once.
<voice_0x0100180C><se_low>Chen Mui: He transformed himself into the likeness of a mouse and chased after <hero> as quickly as he could.

<voice_0x0100180D><se_low>Chen Mui: And now you know the whole story.
My apologies for keeping it from you until now.
Please forgive this doddering old man.
<voice_0x0100180E><se_low>Chen Mui: As for the ring... I would like you to have it.
<voice_0x0100180F><se_low>Chen Mui: I think Xia...your mother...would have wanted it that way.
<Cap><hero> acquires the Argon ring.
<voice_0x01001810><se_low>Chen Mui: Perhaps you should have another look around the Sanctuary. Or would you like to hear the story again?

<voice_0x01001811><se_low>Chen Mui: Hardly a surprise, given the length of the tale.
It's a lot to take in all at once.
Allow me to begin again...
<voice_0x01001812><se_low>Chen Mui: Hardly a surprise, given the length of the tale.
<voice_0x01001813><se_low>Chen Mui: Let us make our rounds of the Sanctuary and tell everyone of your valiant service to the Dragovian Elders.

<voice_0x010017DD><se_high>Jessica: Sorry, do you know him or something?
And what do you mean, ‘a strange hand’?

<voice_0x010017DE><se_def>Angelo: How is it that you know our friend here?
And what's all this about fate?
